NEERI Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 04 Project Associate I/II Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 16, 2025, 11:08 IST
 Council of Scientific & Industrial Research
 4 Jobs |  Posted On : 16-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 25,000 to 35,000




FOLLOW

The National Environmental Engineering Research Institute (NEERI) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 04 Project Associate I/II Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the deadline. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B.Tech in Civil, Mechanical, Computer Science Engineering, M.Sc, M.E./M. Tech can apply for the NEERI Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

NEERI Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Project Associate I	03	B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Mechanical, and Computer Science Engineering
Project Associate II	01	M.E./M. Tech, M.Sc

NEERI Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

NEERI Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

NEERI Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

NEERI Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 25,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 35,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the NEERI Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the NEERI Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	16-08-2025
Closing date	18-08-2025

 

Apply Online	Click Here
Official Notification for Project Associate II	Click Here
Official Notification for Project Associate I	Click Here
